# ObjectCaptureSession.Tracking.limited(reason:)

**Case**

Tracking is available but its quality is degraded. The ARKit coaching overlay will appear when [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ObjectCaptureSession/cameraTracking] enters this state.

## Declaration

```swift
case limited(reason: ObjectCaptureSession.Tracking.Reason)
```

## Parameters

- **reason**: Why tracking is currently degraded.
title: ObjectCaptureSession.Tracking.limited(reason:)
